txt.en:
Take a chance when removing an active Trick; apply one of four effects to the enemy based on the Trick removed.

<rgb=#00FFDD>Trick: Dust in the Eyes will restore Power and allow you to briefly enter Stealth

Trick: Disable will restore Morale

Trick: Enrage will apply a Damage over Time effect

Trick: Counter Defence will deal Damage</RGB>
